about_the_game:
"Bazaar Simulator" is a detailed first-person simulation that allows you to experience the bustling life of a traditional fruit and vegetable market. Start your journey with a lemon stand and take steps towards building your own market empire.

Collaboration with Multiplayer Feature

Collaborate online with friends or other players. Manage larger markets together, share resources, and support each other on the path to becoming the best market vendor. Enjoy a realistic market experience together.

Traditional and Digital Scale Systems

Accurately weigh your fruits and vegetables using the traditional scale system used in markets. As you grow your business, upgrade to digital scales to increase speed and efficiency. Enhance your scale systems to provide the best service to your customers.

Stock Ordering and Management

Carefully purchase, organize, and transfer your stock from crates to stalls. Remember, fruits and vegetables spoil over time; effective stock management is critical to your success.

Fishing and Product Variety

Increase your product variety by adding fresh fish to your market stall. Offer a wider selection to your customers by fishing or sourcing fish, and become the most preferred stall in the market.

Interactive Sales Experience

Assist customers in their choices and manage payments both in cash and via QR code or IBAN. Ensure every customer leaves satisfied, creating repeat customers and a lively market atmosphere.

Adapt to Market Fluctuations

Purchase products when prices are low in a dynamic market environment and set competitive sales prices. Grow your business by balancing profit margins with customer satisfaction.

From Lemon Stand to Market Empire

Every choice in "Bazaar Simulator" affects your success. Will you build your own market empire starting from a lemon stand, or will you remain a lemon vendor

name: Bazaar Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / AMD RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5 6600K / AMD RYZEN 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Set up stalls with fresh vegetables, fruits, and fish. Deliver customer orders, set prices, and expand your bazaar. Catch your own fish to sell and enjoy fishing's thrill. Collaborate with friends in multiplayer mode to manage the bazaar together. Much more is coming soon!
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian
